changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE chats ( id uuid, communication_type text, chat_type text, external_id text, payload text, created_at timestamp, updated_at timestamp, PRIMARY KEY ((id, communication_type), chat_type) );

changeSet.author: i.pleshanov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE chat_activity ( bucket_day text, communication_type text, latest_activity timestamp, chat_id uuid, PRIMARY KEY ((bucket_day, communication_type), latest_activity) ) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (latest_activity DESC);
